text:
[Verse]
Woke up in the city lights
Stars so bright in midnight skies
Searching for a place to go
Lost in rhythm let it flow

[Verse 2]
Heartbeat racing feel the sound
Feet on fire as they pound
No path no map just breathe
In the moment wild and free

[Chorus]
Lost in the moment
Echoes in our heads
Midnight serenades
Never want this to end

[Verse 3]
City whispers soft and low
Where we'll end up we don't know
Every step a chance to fly
Underneath the endless sky

[Bridge]
Let the music guide our way
Dawn can wait for another day
Feel the pulse of this great town
Dancing as the moon goes down

[Verse 4]
Street lights cast a golden hue
Every shadow feels brand new
Weaving through the night's enchant
In this endless rhythm dance
title: Lost in the Moment
